mapper.select: SELECT HL.LIKE_NO,HP.HP_NO, HP.HP_NAME, HP.HP_PHONE,HP.HP_POSTCODE,HP.HP_ADDRESS, DECODE(HT.HP_OPEN_TIME,NULL,'휴무',HT.HP_OPEN_TIME,HT.HP_OPEN_TIME||'~'||HT.HP_CLOSE_TIME) AS HP_TIME, DHP.DRHP_ORIGIN,DHP.DRHP_RENAME,DHP.DRHP_FILEPATH, LISTAGG(CAST(HG.HPCATE_name AS VARCHAR(100)),',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY HL.LIKE_NO)AS HPCATE_NAME FROM HPLIST HPL LEFT JOIN HPCATEGORY HG ON(HPL.HPCATE_CODE=HG.HPCATE_CODE) LEFT JOIN HPLIKE HL ON(HL.HP_NO=HPL.HP_NO) LEFT JOIN HOSPITAL HP ON(HL.HP_NO = HP.HP_NO) LEFT JOIN HPTIME HT ON(HL.HP_NO = HT.HP_UNIQUENO) LEFT JOIN DRHPPHOTO DHP ON(HP.HP_NO=DHP.HP_NO) WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'DAY') = HT.HP_DAY AND HL.C_NO =#{cNo} AND HP.HP_STATUS = 'Y' AND DHP.PH_CODE =5 group by HL.LIKE_NO, HP.HP_NO, HP.HP_NAME, HP.HP_PHONE, HP.HP_POSTCODE, HP.HP_ADDRESS, DECODE(HT.HP_OPEN_TIME,NULL,'휴무',HT.HP_OPEN_TIME,HT.HP_OPEN_TIME||'~'||HT.HP_CLOSE_TIME), DHP.DRHP_ORIGIN, DHP.DRHP_RENAME, DHP.DRHP_FILEPATH ORDER BY HL.LIKE_NO DESC

SELECT HP.HP_NO, HP.HP_NAME, DECODE(ROUND(SUM(HW.HP_RE_AVG_RATE)/COUNT(HW.HP_RE_AVG_RATE),1),NULL,0, ROUND(SUM(HW.HP_RE_AVG_RATE)/COUNT(HW.HP_RE_AVG_RATE),1),ROUND(SUM(HW.HP_RE_AVG_RATE)/COUNT(HW.HP_RE_AVG_RATE),1)) AS HP_RE_AVG_RATE, COUNT(HW.HP_RE_AVG_RATE) AS REVIEWCOUNT FROM HPLIKE HL LEFT JOIN HOSPITAL HP ON(HL.HP_NO = HP.HP_NO) LEFT JOIN HPREVIEW HW ON(HP.HP_NO=HW.HP_NO) WHERE HL.C_NO =#{cNo} AND HP.HP_STATUS = 'Y' AND HW.RECEIPT_YN = 'Y' group by HL.LIKE_NO, HP.HP_NO, HP.HP_NAME ORDER BY HL.LIKE_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HPLIKE WHERE C_NO=#{cNo}

SELECT PR.PDREVIEW_CONTENT, PR.ORDER_NO, PR.PD_NO, PA.ORDER_DATE,PD.PD_NAME,PR.PDREVIEW_NO,PR.C_NO,PR.PRP_RENAME FROM PRODUCTREVIEW PR JOIN PAYMENT PA ON(PR.ORDER_NO=PA.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT PD ON(PD.PD_NO=PR.PD_NO) WHERE PR.C_NO=#{cNo} ORDER BY PR.PDREVIEW_NO DESC

SELECT PA.ORDER_NO,PA.ORDER_DATE,TO_CHAR(PA.AMOUNT_PRICE,'999,999,999') AS AMOUNT_PRICE,PA.C_NO,OP.PD_NO,PD.PD_NAME, OS.O_CODE,OS.O_NAME,PH.PDP_RENAME FROM PAYMENT PA LEFT JOIN ORDERPRODUCT OP ON(PA.ORDER_NO=OP.ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN PRODUCT PD ON(PD.PD_NO=OP.PD_NO) RIGHT JOIN ORDERMG OM ON(OM.ORDER_NO=PA.ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN ORDER_STATE OS ON(OM.O_CODE=OS.O_CODE) LEFT JOIN PRODUCTPHOTO PH ON(PH.PD_NO=PD.PD_NO) WHERE PA.C_NO =#{cNo} AND (OM.O_CODE BETWEEN 1 AND 5 OR OM.O_CODE=14) AND PH.PDP_TYPE=0 AND OP.PD_NO=OM.PD_NO ORDER BY PA.ORDER_NO DESC

SELECT PA.ORDER_NO,PA.ORDER_DATE,TO_CHAR(PA.AMOUNT_PRICE,'999,999,999') AS AMOUNT_PRICE,PA.PAYMENT_WAY,PA.USE_POINT,PA.C_NO,OP.PD_NO,OP.OP_COUNT, PD.PD_NAME,OS.O_CODE,OS.O_NAME, TO_CHAR(ORIGIN_PRICE-SELL_PRICE+PA.USE_POINT,'999,999,999') AS DISCOUNT_PRICE,TO_CHAR(PD.ORIGIN_PRICE,'999,999,999') AS ORIGIN_PRICE, C.C_NAME,C.C_POSTCODE,C.C_ADDRESS,C.C_PHONE ,TO_CHAR(ORIGIN_PRICE*OP.OP_COUNT,'999,999,999') AS COUNTMULTIPLE FROM PAYMENT PA JOIN ORDERPRODUCT OP ON(PA.ORDER_NO=OP.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT PD ON(PD.PD_NO=OP.PD_NO) JOIN ORDERMG OM ON(OM.ORDER_NO=PA.ORDER_NO) JOIN ORDER_STATE OS ON(OM.O_CODE=OS.O_CODE) JOIN CLIENT C ON(OM.C_NO=C.C_NO) WHERE PA.C_NO =#{cNo} AND OM.ORDER_NO=#{orderNo} AND PD.PD_NO = #{pdNo} AND OP.PD_NO=OM.PD_NO ORDER BY PA.ORDER_DATE DESC

SELECT PA.ORDER_NO, PA.ORDER_DATE, TO_CHAR(PA.AMOUNT_PRICE,'999,999,999') AS AMOUNT_PRICE, PA.C_NO, OP.PD_NO, PD.PD_NAME, OS.O_CODE, OS.O_NAME, PH.PDP_RENAME FROM PAYMENT PA JOIN ORDERPRODUCT OP ON(PA.ORDER_NO=OP.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT PD ON(PD.PD_NO=OP.PD_NO) JOIN ORDERMG OM ON(OM.ORDER_NO=PA.ORDER_NO) JOIN ORDER_STATE OS ON(OM.O_CODE=OS.O_CODE) JOIN PRODUCTPHOTO PH ON(PH.PD_NO=PD.PD_NO) WHERE PA.C_NO =#{cNo} AND (OM.O_CODE BETWEEN 1 AND 5 OR OM.O_CODE=14) AND PH.PDP_TYPE=0 AND OP.PD_NO=OM.PD_NO AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE,'YY/MM/DD') AND 7>=TRUNC(SYSDATE)-ORDER_DATE AND 30>=TRUNC(SYSDATE) - ORDER_DATE AND 90>= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - ORDER_DATE AND 180>= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - ORDER_DATE ORDER BY PA.ORDER_NO DESC

SELECT PA.ORDER_NO,PA.ORDER_DATE,TO_CHAR(PA.AMOUNT_PRICE,'999,999,999') AS AMOUNT_PRICE,PA.C_NO,OP.PD_NO,PD.PD_NAME, OS.O_CODE,OS.O_NAME,PH.PDP_RENAME FROM PAYMENT PA JOIN ORDERPRODUCT OP ON(PA.ORDER_NO=OP.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT PD ON(PD.PD_NO=OP.PD_NO) JOIN ORDERMG OM ON(OM.ORDER_NO=PA.ORDER_NO) JOIN ORDER_STATE OS ON(OM.O_CODE=OS.O_CODE) JOIN PRODUCTPHOTO PH ON(PH.PD_NO=PD.PD_NO) WHERE PA.C_NO =#{cNo} AND ((OM.O_CODE BETWEEN 1 AND 5) OR OM.O_CODE=14) AND ORDER_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(#{calendarDate1}),'YY/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(#{calendarDate2}+1,'YY/MM/DD')) AND PH.PDP_TYPE=0 AND OP.PD_NO=OM.PD_NO ORDER BY PA.ORDER_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDERMG SET O_CODE=14 WHERE ORDER_NO =#{orderNo} AND C_NO=#{cNo} AND PD_NO=#{pdNo}
mapper.select: SELECT OQ.*,P.PD_NO,P.PD_NAME,OM.C_NO FROM ORDERQNA OQ JOIN ORDERMG OM ON(OQ.ORDER_NO=OM.ORDER_NO) JOIN ORDERPRODUCT OP ON(OM.ORDER_NO=OP.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT P ON(P.PD_NO=OP.PD_NO) WHERE OM.C_NO=#{cNo} AND OQ.OQNA_STATUS='Y' AND OQ.PD_NO=OM.PD_NO AND OM.PD_NO = OP.PD_NO ORDER BY OQ.OQNA_NO DESC

SELECT OQ.*,P.PD_NO,P.PD_NAME,OM.C_NO FROM ORDERQNA OQ JOIN ORDERMG OM ON(OQ.ORDER_NO=OM.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT P ON(P.PD_NO=OQ.PD_NO) WHERE OM.C_NO=#{cNo} AND OQ.OQNA_STATUS='N' AND OM.PD_NO=OQ.PD_NO ORDER BY OQ.OQNA_NO DESC

SELECT PA.ORDER_NO,PA.ORDER_DATE,TO_CHAR(PA.AMOUNT_PRICE,'999,999,999') AS AMOUNT_PRICE,PA.C_NO,OP.PD_NO,PD.PD_NAME, OS.O_CODE,OS.O_NAME,PH.PDP_RENAME FROM PAYMENT PA JOIN ORDERPRODUCT OP ON(PA.ORDER_NO=OP.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT PD ON(PD.PD_NO=OP.PD_NO) JOIN ORDERMG OM ON(OM.ORDER_NO=PA.ORDER_NO) JOIN ORDER_STATE OS ON(OM.O_CODE=OS.O_CODE) JOIN PRODUCTPHOTO PH ON(PH.PD_NO=PD.PD_NO) WHERE PA.C_NO =#{cNo} AND PH.PDP_TYPE=0 AND (OM.O_CODE BETWEEN 6 AND 13 OR OM.O_CODE = 15) AND OP.PD_NO=OM.PD_NO ORDER BY PA.ORDER_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAYMENT PA JOIN ORDERMG OM ON(OM.ORDER_NO=PA.ORDER_NO) WHERE PA.C_NO=#{cNo} AND (OM.O_CODE BETWEEN 1 AND 5 OR OM.O_CODE =14) AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE,'YY/MM/DD') AND 7>=TRUNC(SYSDATE)-PA.ORDER_DATE AND 30>=TRUNC(SYSDATE) - PA.ORDER_DATE AND 90>= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - PA.ORDER_DATE AND 180>= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - PA.ORDER_DATE

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAYMENT PA JOIN ORDERMG OM ON(OM.ORDER_NO=PA.ORDER_NO) WHERE PA.C_NO=#{cNo} AND (OM.O_CODE BETWEEN 1 AND 5 OR OM.O_CODE =14) AND PA.ORDER_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(#{calendarDate1}),'YY/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(#{calendarDate2}+1,'YY/MM/DD')) ORDER BY PA.ORDER_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDERQNA OQ JOIN ORDERMG OM ON(OQ.ORDER_NO=OM.ORDER_NO) WHERE OM.C_NO=#{cNo} AND OQ.PD_NO=OM.PD_NO AND OQNA_STATUS='Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCTREVIEW SET PDREVIEW_CONTENT = #{pdReviewContent}, PRP_ORIGINAL=#{originFile}, PRP_RENAME=#{renameFile} WHERE ORDER_NO=#{orderNo} AND C_NO=#{cNo} AND PD_NO = #{pdNo}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(SUM(use_point),0) AS MONTHSUMUSEPOINT FROM PAYMENT WHERE C_NO=#{cNo} AND TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE,'Month') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'Month')
SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MONTH') AS NOWMONTH FROM DUAL

SELECT TO_CHAR('-'||P.USE_POINT,'999,999,999') AS USESAVE_POINT, P.USE_DATE AS USESAVE_DATE, PD.PD_NAME AS PDHPNAME, PD.PD_NO AS HP_RE_NO, PD.ORIGIN_PRICE AS ADR_NO FROM PAYMENT P JOIN ORDERPRODUCT OP ON(P.ORDER_NO=OP.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT PD ON(OP.PD_NO=PD.PD_NO) WHERE P.C_NO=#{cNo} AND USE_POINT !=0
UNION
SELECT TO_CHAR(PS.GETPOINT,'999,999,999'), PS.GETDATE, H.HP_NAME, ps.hp_re_no, PS.ADR_NO FROM POINTSAVE PS JOIN HPREVIEW HW ON(PS.HP_RE_NO = HW.HP_RE_NO) JOIN HOSPITAL H ON(HW.HP_NO=H.HP_NO) WHERE PS.C_NO=#{cNo}
UNION
SELECT TO_CHAR(PS.GETPOINT,'999,999,999'), PS.GETDATE, AD.AD_TITLE, ps.hp_re_no, PS.ADR_NO FROM POINTSAVE PS JOIN ASKDRREPLY A ON(A.ADR_NO = PS.ADR_NO) JOIN ASKDR AD ON(AD.AD_NO=A.AD_NO) WHERE PS.C_NO=#{cNo} ORDER BY 2 DESC

select count(*) from( SELECT TO_CHAR('-'||P.USE_POINT,'999,999,999') AS USESAVE_POINT,P.USE_DATE AS USESAVE_DATE,PD.PD_NAME AS PDHPNAME,PD.PD_NO AS HP_RE_NO,PD.ORIGIN_PRICE AS ADR_NO FROM PAYMENT P JOIN ORDERPRODUCT OP ON(P.ORDER_NO=OP.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT PD ON(OP.PD_NO=PD.PD_NO) WHERE P.C_NO=#{cNo} AND USE_POINT !=0
UNION
SELECT TO_CHAR(PS.GETPOINT,'999,999,999'),PS.GETDATE,H.HP_NAME,ps.hp_re_no,PS.ADR_NO FROM POINTSAVE PS JOIN HPREVIEW HW ON(PS.HP_RE_NO = HW.HP_RE_NO) JOIN HOSPITAL H ON(HW.HP_NO=H.HP_NO) WHERE PS.C_NO=#{cNo}
UNION
SELECT TO_CHAR(PS.GETPOINT,'999,999,999'),PS.GETDATE,AD.AD_TITLE,ps.hp_re_no,PS.ADR_NO FROM POINTSAVE PS JOIN ASKDRREPLY A ON(A.ADR_NO = PS.ADR_NO) JOIN ASKDR AD ON(AD.AD_NO=A.AD_NO) WHERE PS.C_NO=#{cNo} ORDER BY 2 DESC)
